message: Let's start fair.  I'll take 60% and you get 40%.  Hopefully we can reach a deal quickly before the money inflates away!
I'm willing to compromise, but I think 50/50 is a fair starting point. Let's see if we can find a better deal from here.
Okay, I see your point about 50/50 being fair.  Let's split the difference.  I'll take 55%, you take 45%.  Let's get this done before we lose too much more money!
I'm still not comfortable with the 55/45 split. I'll meet you halfway between 50/50 and your original 60/40 offer. 52/48 seems like a fair compromise. Let's see if we can make a deal.
